sentences.text: There are several job openings at the restaurant right now.
sentences.meaning: 那間餐廳目前有幾個空缺

sentences.text: JX Finances officially announced the opening of its first international branch.
sentences.meaning: JX Finances公司正式宣布第一間海外分公司開始營業

remarks.title: 文法
remarks.text:
an opening 空缺(可數名詞)
opening 表示「空缺、職缺」時是可數名詞，前面要有不定冠詞 an ，或是用複數形 openings。

remarks.title: 同義詞
remarks.text: 表示「空缺」時，opening 可以換成 vacancy
